title: The Flood
overview: The events revolve around the family of Almndouh affordable and mother of the need Safia, which gave birth to her sons after the death of her husband, who left the land in Ismailia, which coincided with the draft Suez Canal and the price of land 300 million pounds. A great fortune has descended upon the family and each of them has millions in the blink of an eye, so how will they behave? How their lives will change when they face this "deluge".
